Title: Earthquake destruction and the reduction of disaster popularization charts
Notes: "Earthquake destruction and the reduction of disaster popularization charts" (地震灾害与减灾科普挂图) is a 12-poster series published in 1992 by the National Seismological Administration.Entitled "When disaster strikes one side, support comes from all sides" (一方有灾 八方支援), the poster shows relief goods being flown in by helicopter, and other examples of solidarity.
